title: Reformat The String
content:
Given alphanumeric string s. (Alphanumeric string is a string consisting of lowercase English letters and digits).
You have to find a permutation of the string where no letter is followed by another letter and no digit is followed by another digit. That is, no two adjacent characters have

title: Maximum Score After Splitting a String
content:
Given a string s of zeros and ones, return the maximum score after splitting the string into two non-empty substrings (i.e. left substring and right substring).
The score after splitting a string is the number of zeros in the left substring plus the number of ones in the right substring.<

title: Find a single occurring element in an array where each element occurred twice.
Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
Add Two Numbers in Linked List (In reverse Order)
content:
You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. The digits are stored in reverse order and each of their nodes contains a single digit. Add the two numbers and return them as a linked list.

title: Add Two Numbers in Linked List In Given Order
Two sum problem ( With Repeating Numbers )
content:
Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.
